Summary: White ,small, Round, Stright line, Dome shape with dark edges on both ends. All objects mostly white (except the edges on some)
divs: Sighting Details1ST object was like a line across the screen, when I hooked it up to the T.V set and freeze Frame the object it had a good size gap between the two. It went across the screeen in 1 secound. (Zoom was at it widest). And pointed N-E Approx 70*-80* degrees. (This object was dark in color) Most of the objects were white in color and very small if I didn't have it on T.V I wouldn't have seen them, about 10. Most object moved errectic except for 1 it moved steady across the bootom of the screen,which lasted 1 minute and 16 secounds. Another looked like it had a Dome on it and darker on the both ends.2> When I looked at the Tape. 3> At first it might be a ballon, intill I freeze a frame and could see 2 objects flying next to each other.5>Glad I had them on Tape.6< They would zip out, or slowly move off screen.
Object Shape: Bullet, Missile, Circle, Sphere, Star-like, Other
trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Modesto
